alert.note: Alert for Chisago; Isanti (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chisago, east central Isanti and central Polk Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near North Branch, or 6 miles east of Cambridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... North Branch around 555 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Luck, Centuria and Milltown. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 146 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Minnesota...and northwestern Wisconsin.
